Enjoy the suspense and intrigue these films offer!

This movie centers around a homicide detective and an anthropologist who try to destroy a terrifying creature wreaking havoc in a Chicago museum.

Alternatively, if you're interested in a more character-driven film, "Restless" might be for you. Starring Mia Wasikowska, Hayley Atwell, and Rufus Sewell, this movie follows the story of a young man who develops an unexpected relationship that could change his life forever.

If you prefer something more grounded in reality, "The Equalizer" is another great choice. Denzel Washington plays a retired CIA agent turned vigilante who fights against injustice. The plot explores the moral ambiguity of his actions, making for a thought-provoking watch. Enjoy!

Starring Spencer Tracy, it's a timeless tale that showcases the beauty of perseverance and determination. Enjoy your movie time!
